reviewText: This seller is praying on everyday people who do not know video jargon. The DVD is "Region 2" and therefore does not play on "Region 1" DVD players. The U.S. is "Region 1". My daughters were incredibly angry as am I!

No stars!!!!! I got this so my daughter could complete her collection just to put it in the dvd player to find out she cant even watch them! It should say at the top cant watch on us dvd and wherever else! Im p $ ssed off because I cant even get a refund
My children love monster high and I ordered this not knowing it was region 2 and we couldn't watch it.
